But you nod, your face warm, and there's no way you can stop yourself from smiling now. ‚ÄúUm, y- yeah.‚Äù You stammer before clearing your throat softly. ‚ÄúYes.‚Äù You say, more confident in your answer. ‚ÄúYes, I would.. love to go with you. entry.title: Apartment 3B
entry.summary:
Author: ElaineInABox

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,316Chapters: 3/15Kudos: 99

Summary: You weren‚Äôt looking for love, just somewhere cheap, quiet, and safe enough to get you through the semester. Jason Todd wasn‚Äôt looking for company, just a roommate who wouldn‚Äôt ask questions about why he came home at two AM bloody and bruised.But in a cramped apartment in Crime Alley, between burnt coffee, leaky ceilings, and the soft hum of the city that never sleeps, the silence between you starts to change. What begins as survival becomes something quieter, steadier‚Äîsomething that almost feels like home.

entry.summary:
Author: nocteris

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,384Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 17

Summary: It was always like this, at least for Jason. He saw her every now and then when he had time to spare. For him, she was like that favorite shirt you wore when it felt just right, which made it all the more special. He kept his distance, far be it for him to disrupt the peace she‚Äôd built up for herself. The thought of her being safe and happy, brings him a sense of relief, the foreign kind in his life. The sight of her seeing his dating profile, no less Swiping Right did not, bring him any sense of relief. ‚Äî‚ÄîWhere Jason and the reader were the closest growing up in the Wayne family, yet being the most oblivious to each other‚Äôs feelings. entry.title: Glass Homes
entry.summary:
Author: Imsbdl

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,138Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 8

Summary: A kid goes missing and suddenly you're drowning in memories of the broken streets that raised you. It is a recurring story, swept under files at GCPD never to see the light of day. Never to reunite weeping mothers and kids together, the malice in this city grips at the children so fast, throwing them into a world they have no place in. Crime Alley. It can't happen again... You don't know how little you matter until you're all alone. Gripped by a powerful man as the world around you crumbles. It can't happen again. Even if your life becomes languidly intertwined with a vigilante, on quiet nights and open windowsills, it won't happen again.

entry.title: O, Weaver of Lazarus
entry.summary:
Author: fyodvvr

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,009Chapters: 2/35Kudos: 6

Summary: 3 years after making a deal with a broken man you end up rediscovering the field of medicine. While seeking to recover from permanent amnesia you find yourself transferred from a local ER to Gotham's General Hospital - the life you thought you had established crumbles.You see the world in strings, not those of fate, but of souls, shifting and knotting through fragile bodies. As strange dreams bleed into waking hours, shadows of forgotten friends stir, and their faces seem to know you too well. Memory calls from the dark, whispering truths you wished were left buried. Will you remember what was lost or lose yourself to the madness that waits behind it?
